document.heading: Gallery Place Project Graphics Amendment Act of 2004

history.narrative: Law 15-278, the “Gallery Place Project Graphics Amendment Act of 2004”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 15-313, which was referred to the Committee on Consumers and Regulatory Affairs. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 9, 2004, and December 7, 2004, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 29, 2004, it was assigned Act No. 15-669 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 15-278 became effective on April 5, 2005.
